snippet.title: Beyond The Thaw - 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Payara Games team present you Beyond The Thaw — a narrative story-driven adventure game for PC. Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1434010/Beyond_The_Thaw/

You are a Max Gilbert, a former military doctor. While taking a trip to your usual place of stay, which is a nice cabin near the lake, the next moment you find yourself alone in the middle of nowhere, fighting fierce cold and facing series of trials. What is it: reality or mind games, behind which lies your truly hidden deep secret?
